website_summaries.verdict: An inexpensive set of covers that is durable and works well to ward off everything from snow to birds.
pros: Made from premium quality weatherproof material
Stands up well to wind, rain, and birds
cons: Reports that these covers do not fit larger mirrors (Nissan Quest and Jeep Rubicon, for example)

customer_reviews.title: For the past two years I will walk out to my car and have a bird crap on the mirror and down the door
customer_reviews.text: Too early to give a five star rating but thus far I’m loving them. For the past two years I will walk out to my car and have a bird crap on the mirror and down the door. I thought to myself there had to be something out there besides plastic bags from the grocery stores strapped down with a bungee cord. To my surprise a quick Google search and I found these, way easier to put on and take off.
customer_reviews.author: Scott H

customer_reviews.title: Better than garbage bags
customer_reviews.text: Truly.. they work like they are suppose to and you aren't trying to tie a grocery bag around your mirrors to lessen the time of clearing snow and ice. Love that they have a carrying case you can put them back into. Easy to keep them together in the car when not in use.
customer_reviews.author: California Faye

customer_reviews.title: Side Mirror Covers are more than just to keep off snow and ice.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these to keep the birds from attacking their refections in the side mirrors and pooping on the car in the process. The covers are easy to put on and take off, even with the cord placed in the door jam to keep them from being stolen. I am so glad that I did not get another brand that would have been way too large.
customer_reviews.author: Roy W.

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: I used these mirror covers last year from December through March, and the only problem I had was one of the drawstring pulls broke and the spring inside it popped out. I was still able to use it by tying the drawstring, but that made it a little harder to remove when there was ice on it. All in all I'd say for the price this was a great item and did stand up to some pretty horrendous winter weather.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Reed

customer_reviews.title: Simple and Does the Job
customer_reviews.text: I mean, they're mirror covers. Nothing too exciting here. They're easy to get on and off, stay secure via the slip strap thingy, and protect from ice. I was worried maybe the button mechanism to tighten the ties might freeze, but positioning it under the mirror arms, I haven't had that issue. Definitely a good buy, especially to go with a windshield cover.
customer_reviews.author: Lenoir

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Used them for the first time last night. No scraping ice off this morning. Easy to put on, easy to take off, and the cord is long enough to be closed inside the door to (hopefully) prevent theft. Overall a great product at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: S. DeBoer

customer_reviews.title: ... these yet but I am sure they will work great as I live in Georgia and we get ice ...
customer_reviews.text: I haven't had the chance to use these yet but I am sure they will work great as I live in Georgia and we get ice - my past experiences with ice is that you Can't scrape your side mirrors - I will put these on when my car is outside at work - looking forward to using them ...
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: I like it and don’t regret buying it
customer_reviews.text: Does what it says. They’re basically like two mini drawstring bags. It’s not the best quality I would say but worth it for what it cost
customer_reviews.author: bpat

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to protect my wife's side mirrors while parked in the garage. She has a Fiat Spyder Abarth and it sits low, so these will protect the mirrors when we walk beside the car.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin O.

customer_reviews.title: No longer have to chip ice off my mirrors
customer_reviews.text: Do what they are designed to do--keep snow and ice off the mirrors. However, the mirrors on my van must be a bit large as they are a tight fit.
customer_reviews.author: M. Edwards

customer_reviews.title: I'm Sure They Are Nice Units...
customer_reviews.text: ... But they don't fit my Chevy Tahoe. I'll give them to the wife to see if they fit her Honda CR-V.
customer_reviews.author: Michael D. Fisher

customer_reviews.title: They're OK
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting something a little more substantial. They're rather thin and just barely fit mirrors on wife's Fusion. I honestly do not expect these to last more than 2 years if that.
customer_reviews.author: WKS

customer_reviews.title: Very Cheap and poorly stitched together.
customer_reviews.text: Wow, these things are made cheap. The threading is already coming apart by just taking them out of the package and the material used to make these are so thin you can see through it.
customer_reviews.author: VIRUS8

customer_reviews.title: They Work
customer_reviews.text: I have a crazy cardinal that won't stay off my car, Did not purchase for snow, but they sure keep the birds off of my car and can't destroy the cover. 2nd time I have purchased for another car.
customer_reviews.author: Verified Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Just Great - No Brainer's.
customer_reviews.text: Just Great - No Brainer's when snow is a concern. Easy on and off. Do not take much storage space. Overall just Great - they do the job.
customer_reviews.author: Taowalker

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I just purchased a new car and these work great for keeping the birds from obsessing over their reflections in the side mirrors. No more poop down the side of the car! Also the material repels water so I can keep them in my door and don’t worry about puddles.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Jodoin

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: These work quite well. Easily put on the mirrors and tightened to keep them from blowing off in the snow.
customer_reviews.author: Annon

customer_reviews.title: No more frozen mirrors
customer_reviews.text: Lives up to its reputation. Durable and works well. Would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Jacob

customer_reviews.title: Snall
customer_reviews.text: Much too small for use on my F-150, can't use them.
customer_reviews.author: Adirondacker

customer_reviews.title: So simple, it's brilliant
customer_reviews.text: They are pouches for your mirror. So simple. Work great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Works great I use them to keep birds from in mirror then go to bathroom down side of my truck and car
customer_reviews.author: Lester zierk

customer_reviews.title: Works .. well made
customer_reviews.text: I thought of this product ... then I discovered I was not the first. I use it to protect from an cardinal that likes to fight his reflection.
customer_reviews.author: DTravis

customer_reviews.title: There's easy way shopping
customer_reviews.text: My car and it helps with less area to clear snow from
customer_reviews.author: Lucy Rubino

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and durable
customer_reviews.text: Fits my Cruze perfectly! Easy to use and durable! Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I wish I had this last year. It's simple and it works. It saves me from scraping the mirrors in the morning.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Muzaffer

product_meta.title: Zone Tech Auto Side Mirror Protective Cover - Premium Quality Classic Black Auto Exterior Mirror Covers from Snow, Ice and Frost
feature_bullets: ► WEATHERPROOF - The Zone Tech side mirror cover is weatherproof. It keeps your mirror from snow, ice and frost. A total must-have during winter. Preserves your mirror from heavy snow.
► PREMIUM QUALITY - The Zone Tech side mirror cover is constructed out of premium quality materials to provide maximum strength and durability.
► DURABLE - The Zone Tech side mirror cover can withstood fairly strong winds and rains for any amount of time.
► UNIVERSAL FIT - The Zone Tech side mirror cover is designed to fit most vehicles. It is universally fit in size.
► EASY TO USE - The Zone Tech side mirror cover is easy to use. Just simply loosen the drawstring, insert the side mirror on the cover, and then tighten back the drawstring.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars67 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
